overallSummary: Fabio Giglietto maintains a strong presence across Mastodon, LinkedIn, and Bluesky, engaging with a diverse audience interested in computational social science and disinformation research. His content consistently receives positive engagement, with LinkedIn showing particularly high interaction levels.

contentThemes.description: Posts frequently discuss methodologies and findings related to disinformation on social media platforms.
Content often includes announcements about job openings and research opportunities in computational social science.

recommendations: Increase posting frequency to maintain and boost engagement.
Incorporate more interactive content, such as polls or Q&A sessions, to encourage audience participation.

platformInsights.mastodon: Content around new releases and methodologies sees good engagement, but expanding audience interaction could improve reposts.
platformInsights.linkedin: Posts related to research grants and hiring opportunities attract substantial engagement, indicating a professional audience interested in career and research advancements.
